item.title: research
item.description: Research A list of peer-reviewed publications (14 total, 9 first author) can be found on arXiv or ADS I also maintain a list below. In reverse-chronological order: M. Kl√∂wer, M. Gelbrecht, D. Hotta, J. Willmert, S. Silvestri, G.L. Wagner, A. White, S. Hatfield, T. Kimpson, N.C. Constantinou, and C. Hill : “SpeedyWeather.jl: Reinventing atmospheric general circulation models towards interactivity and extensibility”. JOSS 2024, doi: 10.21105/joss.06323 J. O’Leary, A. Melatos, T. Kimpson, N.
